ygData.subject: Re: Star of Odus
ygData.msgSnippet: Only thing I know that uses the star of odus is the Ranger quest armor (legs specifically) = Cymoril Bladewing  = Femme Fatale Ranger of the Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
Only thing I know that uses the star of odus is the Ranger quest armor (legs
specifically)

= Cymoril Bladewing <Far Runners>
= Femme Fatale Ranger of the Rathe

----- Original Message -----
From: "Jesse Jones" <jesjones@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 29, 1999 10:13 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Star of Odus


> From: Jesse Jones <jesjones@...>
>
> While exploring the royal palace in Erudin I noticed one of the gem
> merchants selling the Star of Odus for 109 pp. I haven't been able to dig
> up any info on this gem after several web searches. Does anyone know if
> this gem can be used to make jewelry? If so, what are it's properties?
>
> -- Jesse
>
>
